solution_line_template: If Jayden received {jayden_coins} coins, {jason_more_than_jayden} fewer than what Jason received, then Jason received {jayden_coins}+{jason_more_than_jayden} = <<{jayden_coins}+{jason_more_than_jayden}={jason_coins}>>{jason_coins}
Altogether, the two boys received {jason_coins}+{jayden_coins} = <<{jason_coins}+{jayden_coins}={total_coins}>>{total_coins} coins
